full_text:
April 16, 2005

Michele Pagan
Palm Beach Police Department
345 South County Road
Palm Beach, FL 33480

RE: Subpoena #: Investigation
BellSouth #: BST05040711
Received: 2005-04-12

Enclosed is our return of information requested in the above described subpoena. If you have any questions concerning this information, please call our office at 404-986-5630.

Sincerely,
Deborah Trautwein
Compliance Assistant

07/26/17 Page 4 of 104 Public Records Request No.: 17-295
DOJ-OGR-00031621

additional_notes: The document appears to be a response to a subpoena from BellSouth to the Palm Beach Police Department. The letter is signed by Deborah Trautwein, Compliance Assistant. The document is part of a larger collection, as indicated by the 'Page 4 of 104' notation.
